events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I want to request a refund because the size is incorrect and I would like my money back.
The customer's request is related to a refund due to wrong sizing and is categorized accordingly to ensure proper handling.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund request and will follow up shortly with the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear the jacket doesn't fit. I'll be happy to assist you in processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original condition for the refund process?
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is 7845632. Yes, the jacket is still unused and I have the original tags attached.
We have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back by tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
